name: PATIENT_2
description: This table supplements the PATIENT table. It contains basic information about patients.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: RECORD_TYPE_6_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of patient (EPT) record that this row relates to.

columns.name: BIRTH_TM
columns.description: The date and time of the patient's birth in 24 hour format.

columns.name: DEATH_TM
columns.description: The date and time of the patient's death in 24 hour format.

columns.name: FAX
columns.description: The patient's fax number.

columns.name: CITIZENSHIP_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's citizenship status information.

columns.name: MED_HX_NOTE_ID
columns.description: This column contains a link to the General Use Notes (HNO) meds history note for this patient.

columns.name: IS_ADOPTED_YN
columns.description: Capture if patient is adopted or not.

columns.name: BIRTH_HOSPITAL
columns.description: Capture the name of the hospital where the patient was born or first seen after a non-hospital birth.

columns.name: ALRGY_UPD_INST
columns.description: The PATIENT table extracts the last date on which the patient's allergy information was verified. For more granularity, this table extracts the instant (date and time) that this information was verified.

columns.name: BIRTH_CITY
columns.description: The patient's city of birth.

columns.name: BIRTH_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's state of birth.

columns.name: SCHOOL_C_NAME
columns.description: School that the patient attends.

columns.name: REFERRAL_SOURCE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider or other source that referred the patient to the facility. This is distinct from the encounter-specific referral source in PAT_ENC.

columns.name: REFERRAL_SOURCE_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM
columns.description: The name of the referral source.

columns.name: PAT_NAME_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The networked item that points to the patient's name record (EAN).

columns.name: COMM_METHOD_C_ZC_COMM_METHOD_NAME
columns.description: Column to hold the category value of Preferred Communication Method (I EPT 89) for the Patient_2 table.

columns.name: FOSTER_CHILD_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is a foster child.

columns.name: CONF_PAT_REAL_NAME
columns.description: The real name of a confidential patient.

columns.name: PAT_CONF_NM_REC_ID
columns.description: The networked item pointing to the name record for the patient's confidential name.

columns.name: ACTIVE_IER_ID
columns.description: Link to active Identity History (IER) record for this patient.

columns.name: OTH_CITY
columns.description: Contains the city for the patient's prescription address, which can be used by pharmacy to determine where to mail prescriptions.

columns.name: OTH_ZIP
columns.description: Contains the zip code for the patient's prescription address, which can be used by pharmacy to determine where to mail prescriptions.

columns.name: OTH_PHONE
columns.description: Contains the phone number for the patient's prescription address, which can be used by pharmacy to determine where to mail prescriptions.

columns.name: OTH_EMAIL
columns.description: Contains the email for the patient's prescription address, which can be used by pharmacy to determine where to mail prescriptions.

columns.name: OTH_CONTACT_PERSON
columns.description: Contains the contact person for the patient's prescription address, which can be used by pharmacy to determine where to mail prescriptions.

columns.name: OTH_HOUSE_NUMBER
columns.description: Contains the house number for the patient's prescription address, which can be used by pharmacy to determine where to mail prescriptions.

columns.name: OTH_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description: Contains the district for the patient's prescription address, which can be used by pharmacy to determine where to mail prescriptions.

columns.name: OTH_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description: Contains the county for the patient's prescription address, which can be used by pharmacy to determine where to mail prescriptions.

columns.name: OTH_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: Contains the country for the patient's prescription address, which can be used by pharmacy to determine where to mail prescriptions.

columns.name: OTH_START_DATE
columns.description: Contains the start date for the patient's prescription address, which can be used by pharmacy to determine where to mail prescriptions.

columns.name: OTH_END_DATE
columns.description: Contains the end date for the patient's prescription address, which can be used by pharmacy to determine where to mail prescriptions.

columns.name: DEF_ADDRESS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the address that will be used by default by the pharmacy when determining where to mail prescriptions. This can be home, temporary, or prescription.

columns.name: OTH_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: Contains the state for the patient's prescription address, which can be used by pharmacy to determine where to mail prescriptions.

columns.name: MAIDEN_NAME
columns.description: The patient's maiden name.

columns.name: EMPR_CITY
columns.description: The city of the patient's employer.

columns.name: EMPR_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the state of the patient's employer.

columns.name: EMPR_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP code of the patient's employer.

columns.name: EMPR_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the country of the patient's employer.

columns.name: EMPR_PHONE
columns.description: The phone number of the patient's employer.

columns.name: BILL_INSTRUCT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the Billing Instruction Code for the patient.

columns.name: PAT_ASSIST_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the Patient Assistance Code.

columns.name: BILL_COMMENT
columns.description: General comments regarding patient billing instruction

columns.name: CHART_ABSTD_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the chart was abstracted.

columns.name: MOTHER_HEIGHT
columns.description: Height of the patient's mother.  This is used for calculations in the Growth Charts activity.

columns.name: FATHER_HEIGHT
columns.description: Height of the patient's father.  This is used for calculations in the Growth Charts activity.

columns.name: PAT_VERIFICATION_ID
columns.description: Verification record for this patient

columns.name: ALRGY_REV_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the status of the review of allergies.

columns.name: ALRGY_REV_CMT
columns.description: This item stores a comment associated with the review of allergies.

columns.name: REVERSE_NATL_ID
columns.description: Used to store reverse National Identifier in an indexed item for patient search of partial National Identifier.

columns.name: ADV_DIR_REV_DT
columns.description: The date on which a user last reviewed the patient's advanced directive.

columns.name: ADV_DIR_REV_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who last reviewed the patient's advanced directive.

columns.name: ADV_DIR_REV_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LIVING_ARRANGE_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's living arrangement.

columns.name: PED_COMMENT
columns.description: Free-text pediatric comments.
